About the Company: Mukand Engineers Limited is an India-based company. The Company operates in two business segments: construction and Infotech. The Construction segment is involved in construction and engineering activities. The Infotech segment is involved enterprise resource planning (ERP) implementation and infotech services. The business of the Company is mainly in the areas of supply and erection of equipments for power generation plants, integrated steel plants, aluminum plants and hydrocarbon plants. The contracts cover erection of mechanical plant, structural works, piping works and electrical works. The Company also undertakes engineering and project management jobs for steel plants and electrical works at power plants..The company also engagged in the business of Infotech, Construction.
